properties.title: Gainsborough Library

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 19th November 2024** Open to all age 18+ for tea, coffee and biscuits and a friendly chat.
properties.title: Gainsborough Men’s Shed

properties.description: Free hot and cold drinks and refills. Teacakes etc available for a small fee. Free Wi-Fi and free device charging. All ages welcome. Toilets and disabled toilet. Accompanying charity shop selling clothing and home ware at very low prices. Access to children's toys available on request. Come and meet some friendly people, join our jigsaw project, or just sit quietly with some calming adult colouring books (supplied).
properties.title: Storehouse

properties.address: Misterton Community Partnership Library 31 High Street, Misterton, Doncaster DN10 4BU
properties.description: Open to everyone, Library member or not. A weekly newspaper will be available from Tuesday 1st November. Sign up as a library member to access the computers Cost: No cost but donations welcome

hours._text: Tuesday and Thursday. Every second and fourth Saturday of the month Tuesday and Thursday 2:00pm - 5:00pm

properties.description: Indoor seating and views to watch local wildlife. Food and drink are available to purchase. No booking is necessary. Fully accessible and toilets available on site. properties.address: Scrooby Villlage Hall, Low Road DN10 6AJ
properties.contact: Contact Name: Stephen Lincoln Contact Email: scroobypc.stephen.lincoln@gmail.com Contact Phone Number: 07341386050
properties.description: Cards, puzzles, board games, dominoes and similar No fee No need to book The activity will alternate each week with another group, Ripples, run on a similar basis but with different organisers. Everyone is welcome and the way the activity develops will depend on who and how many people attend. The building is wheelchair accessible. A toilet for the disabled is available as are baby changing facilities. Cost: No Charge
